sentences.en: ...a memorandum from the Department of Defense on its role.
sentences.cn: …一份来自国防部的有关其角色的备忘录。

sentences.en: A memorandum was drawn up and signed at 2 A . M. on September 30.
sentences.cn: 备忘录已写出来并在9月30日晨二时签了字.
他大刀阔斧地压缩了斯鲁特的备忘录.

sentences.en: He noted down the date of the meeting in the memorandum book.
sentences.cn: 他把会议日期记到备忘录里.

sentences.en: He personally delivered any memorandum in which he was interested to the President.
sentences.cn: 凡是他关心的文件,他都要亲自面交总统.

sentences.en: He sent us a memorandum about the meeting.
sentences.cn: 他给我们寄来了会议备忘录.

sentences.en: His final report to the President was far more temperate and balanced than the earlier memorandum.
sentences.cn: 和之前的备忘录相比，他递交给总统的总结报告措辞要更为温和得体。

sentences.en: I wrote a memorandum to confirm our verbal agreement.
sentences.cn: 我写了份备忘录以确认我们的口头协议.

sentences.en: Mr. Weaver, here is that memorandum you dictated to me last night.
sentences.cn: 韦佛先生, 这是您昨天晚上叫我笔录的那封便笺.

sentences.en: On April 12,1969, to bring matters to a head, I sent the President a memorandum.
sentences.cn: 1969年4月12日, 为了把事情引入决定性阶段, 我向总统提交一份备忘录.

sentences.en: The content of the articles must be consistent with the memorandum.
sentences.cn: 章程的内容必须和简章一致.
备忘录上注明的日期是2008年8月23日.

sentences.en: The Secretary notes down the date of the meeting in her memorandum book.
sentences.cn: 秘书把会议日期都写在记事本上.

sentences.en: The two sides signed a memorandum of understanding ( MoU ) on cooperation.
sentences.cn: 双方签署了合作谅解备忘录.

sentences.en: What's the subject of the memorandum?
sentences.cn: 是关于什么内容的备忘录.

sentences.en: Which memorandum are you talking about?
sentences.cn: 你说的是哪一份备忘录?

phrases.tran_cn: 公司章程；公司组织大纲
n. 谅解备忘录，理解备忘录；学术合作备忘录

trans.tran_cn: [外]照会，备忘录，[商]便笺，函，记录，[法]（契约等条文的）节略
